siteConfig.name: Optinest
siteConfig.title: Optinest | Web Design, Web Development, AI and SEO
siteConfig.description: Optinest publishes practical guides on web design, web development, AI, and SEO to help teams build faster, rank better, and convert more.

footer.copy: Optinest is a focused publication for teams building modern websites. We share practical web design, web development, AI, and SEO insights you can apply right away.
footer.copyrightText: 2026 Â© Optinest. Built for modern digital growth.

home.heroKicker: Web Design, Development, AI, and SEO
home.heroTitle: Practical Strategies for Web Design, Development, AI, and SEO
home.heroDescription: Explore implementation-focused guides, real workflows, and growth playbooks for building better websites and ranking stronger in search.
home.schemaDescription: Actionable web design, web development, AI, and SEO insights for modern teams.

latestPage.metaTitle: Latest Web Design, Development, AI, and SEO Posts
latestPage.metaDescription: Browse the newest Optinest articles on web design, web development, AI, and SEO, with practical frameworks and implementation details.
latestPage.heroTitle: Latest Posts on Web Design, Development, AI, and SEO
latestPage.heroDescription: Read the newest guides, case-based lessons, and practical breakdowns to improve website quality, performance, and organic growth.

authorsPage.metaDescription: Meet the Optinest contributors covering web design, web development, AI, and SEO with practical, execution-ready advice.
authorsPage.heroDescription: Meet the specialists behind our web design, web development, AI, and SEO content.

aboutPage.metaDescription: Learn about Optinest, a publication dedicated to web design, web development, AI, and SEO best practices.
aboutPage.heroDescription: Optinest is built for teams that want practical guidance on web design, web development, AI, and SEO without the noise.
aboutPage.missionParagraph: Our mission is to publish practical, technically sound insights that help teams ship better digital experiences and grow sustainably through search.
aboutPage.valueQuote: We value clarity over hype, execution over theory, and long-term growth over shortcuts.
aboutPage.experienceParagraph: Every article is designed to be useful in real production work, from component-level design decisions to front-end performance and SEO architecture.
aboutPage.closingParagraph: As the web evolves, we continue to share tested workflows, modern frameworks, and actionable playbooks that connect design quality with measurable results.
aboutPage.planningCaption: Planning practical content for modern web teams.

newsletter.title: Get Weekly Web Design, Development, AI, and SEO Insights
newsletter.description: Every week, we send practical strategies, implementation tips, and optimization ideas you can apply to your next release.
